### To run the script execute the following steps:

<ol>Set your working directory </ol>
<ol>Clone repo with url: https://github.com/slaborde/GCDProject.git using: git clone https://github.com/slaborde/GCDProject.git </ol>

li 3 - Place the folder "UCI HAR Dataset" with all its files in your working directory
li 4 - Run script in R: source("run_analysis.R")
li 5 - Read the output from file "tidyData.txt": 

using i.e the following code:

### Read the tidyData output
test_data <- read.table("tidyData.txt", header = TRUE)
View(test_data)

Notes:
Step 4 will take about 15 seconds running and will produce the output file "tidyData.txt"
